text: Have you tried to make the footer as a module, and making it global module and adding it to the page?

Thank you <@U06G4DKLZJP>, It was resolved!
Actually I didn't include footer module at the bottom of the landing page but there was default empty footer block ({% block footer %} {% endblock footer %}), My bad :yum:
Ah okay glad it was resolved share your results with us for inspo:+1:

Good day everyone, wonder if this has happened to somebody else. when running "hs init" and inputing my personal access key I keep getting this error for a specific HubSpot account but not with others. thank you

```[ERROR] A TypeError has occurred. Cannot read properties of null (reading 'replace')
[ERROR] A TypeError has occurred. Cannot destructure property 'accountId' of '(intermediate value)' as it is undefined.```

Hi Daniel, this is sounding very similar to <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1713817328356049>. We're working on a fix for this but in the meanwhile you should hopefully be able to resolve this by filling in your Account Name in your Hub's settings.
Thank you, will check if that works
